text: Carole Joan Crawford (13 February 1943 â€“ 18 December 2024) was a Jamaican model and beauty queen. She was crowned Miss World 1963. She was also the first winning delegate from both Jamaica and the Caribbean to have won Miss World. Crawford was born in Kingston, Jamaica. Crawford died on 18 December 2024, at the age of 81. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1943 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Miss World winners Category:People from Kingston, Jamaica
title: Carole Crawford
